title: Rice Packs & Kottu prices increased
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Restaurant Owners Association has decided to increase the prices of food items such as Kottu, Packet of Rice, & Shorteats by 20% due to the continuous increase in fuel prices and the current fuel shortage.
The Chairman of the Restaurant Owners Association Asela Sampath said it was decided to increase the price of foods items to protect the industry.
He further said that prices of cooking materials and other relevant items have been increased, and due to that reason they have decided to increase the prices of food items.
